events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit as expected.
The customer's message mentioned 'refund' and 'size does not fit,' so this case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to the customer support representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your order. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and hasnâ€™t been worn or washed.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket. Once we receive it, a full refund will be issued to your original payment method.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please use it to ship the jacket back, and we will handle the refund as soon as we receive the item.
We are checking in to see if you have been able to send the jacket back and to inform you that we are ready to process the refund once received.
Your refund has been processed successfully. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you for shopping with us!
